mapper.select: SELECT PG_VAN_NM AS PG_VAN_NM , SMS_CD AS SMS_CD , DAY_AMT_CD AS DAY_AMT_CD , BASE_DAYS AS BASE_DAYS , PENFEE_RATE AS PENFEE_RATE , REP_CNT AS REP_CNT , ROUND_CD AS ROUND_CD , PW_INIT AS PW_INIT , CALC_STD AS CALC_STD , MID_RCT_YN AS MID_RCT_YN , ID_YN AS ID_YN , HOME_LINKAGE_YN AS HOME_LINKAGE_YN , GOLF_BASE_M AS GOLF_BASE_M , GOLF_ADD_M AS GOLF_ADD_M , L2_IP AS L2_IP , L2_PORT AS L2_PORT , GOLF_CONTROLL_YN AS GOLF_CONTROLL_YN , RD_BK_DD AS RD_BK_DD , SUBSTR(RD_BK_TIME,1,2)||':'||SUBSTR(RD_BK_TIME,3,2) AS RD_BK_TIME , ALLOC_RTN_DIV AS ALLOC_RTN_DIV , DAY_ALLOC_YN AS DAY_ALLOC_YN , ALLOC_PF AS ALLOC_PF , ALLOC_MAX AS ALLOC_MAX , SCR_GOLF_BRK_TIME AS SCR_GOLF_BRK_TIME , SCR_GOLF_LIMIT_TIME AS SCR_GOLF_LIMIT_TIME , LESN_AUTODT AS LESN_AUTODT , PT_CALC AS PT_CALC , REER_NEWAPP_YN AS REER_NEWAPP_YN , LESN_APP_WAY AS LESN_APP_WAY , LESN_PRE_ENTR_TIME AS LESN_PRE_ENTR_TIME , NEXT_MONTH_LESN_REG AS NEXT_MONTH_LESN_REG , RT_DAY AS RT_DAY , RT_REP_CNT AS RT_REP_CNT , HANDKEY_YN AS HANDKEY_YN , OVERDUE_YN AS OVERDUE_YN , LOK_END_DT_STD AS LOK_END_DT_STD , CU_AGREE_YN AS CU_AGREE_YN , CU_AGREE_CONTENT AS CU_AGREE_CONTENT , VISIT_USE_TIME AS VISIT_USE_TIME , GF_TIME_YN AS GF_TIME_YN , DAYTERM_YN AS DAYTERM_YN , ROOM_APP_WAY AS ROOM_APP_WAY , ROOM_DAY_BK_CNT AS ROOM_DAY_BK_CNT FROM TB_ENVINF WHERE CTR_CD = #{CTR_CD} AND COMP_CD = #{COMP_CD}
